title: Mini Membership Sites 2.0: Think It! Build It! Launch It! #obito
description:
Description:
------------

Enjoy Passive Income With Mini-Membership Sites[/color]

Ansel Gough has sold over one million dollars worth of subscriptions to various membership sites. Some of his most successful sites are what he calls MMS - "Mini Membership Sites." One such site sells simple business forms. What is an MMS? Itâ€™s simply a site that sells access to information (such as instructional videos, forms or eBooks) via a password-protected area, or member's area.

This book only has only two purposes:


1. To show you how to select a topic and create your own empire of mini membership sites. Remember you donâ€™t need to earn a lot from each MMS (mini membership site) when you have 10 of them up and running!

2. To show you how to market and bring traffic to your mini membership sites.

Learn how to generate extra income or even full-time income by setting up your own mini membership sites, on any topic. Learn how to come up with a viable topic, outsource or create the content, launch your MMS and start getting subscribers.

The book includes worksheet assignments to help you quickly launch your first site.

THINK IT * BUILD IT * LAUNCH IT
